description.en: High concentration reed diffusers that envelope your interiors with hotel-worthy ambiance.
Room sprays to instantly refresh any corner with your favorite By Velcheva accords.
Plant-based wax candles with deep fragrances and soft golden light.
Elevate every drive with elegant aromas crafted for vehicles.
Special creations inspired by iconic destinations, produced in small batches.
Gentle mists to refresh linens, curtains, and upholstery without staining.
Curate bespoke selections for memorable gifting.
Signature scents tailored for boutiques, showrooms, and hotels.
Elegant tools and accents to elevate your ritual.
